source_caption_data.pre_caption:
This is a scenery shot where the camera slowly pans upward.

The video opens on a residential street with parked cars and a low-rise apartment building, all seen through a canopy of lush green trees. As the camera tilts up, it reveals a sprawling city skyline in the distance, featuring numerous high-rise buildings and a construction crane. In the far background, a majestic mountain range with snow-dusted peaks stands against a blue sky with scattered white clouds.
source_caption_data.pre_caption_prompt: The video is a scenery shot. You do not need to describe the subject motion. Just note that briefly in one to three sentences.
source_caption_data.initial_feedback: Please combine the two paragraphs into one. The camera moves upward, not panning or tilting.
source_caption_data.gpt_feedback: Please merge the two paragraphs into a single cohesive one. Additionally, note that the camera movement is an upward motion, rather than a pan or tilt.
source_caption_data.final_feedback: Please merge the two paragraphs into a single cohesive one. Additionally, note that the camera movement is an upward motion, rather than a pan or tilt.
source_caption_data.gpt_caption: The video begins on a residential street lined with parked cars and a low-rise apartment building, all framed by a canopy of lush green trees. As the camera moves upward, it reveals a sprawling city skyline in the distance, showcasing numerous high-rise buildings and a construction crane. In the far background, a majestic mountain range with snow-dusted peaks stands against a blue sky dotted with scattered white clouds.
source_caption_data.final_caption: The video begins on a residential street lined with parked cars and a low-rise apartment building, all framed by a canopy of lush green trees. As the camera moves upward, it reveals a sprawling city skyline in the distance, showcasing numerous high-rise buildings and a construction crane. In the far background, a majestic mountain range with snow-dusted peaks stands against a blue sky dotted with scattered white clouds.

generated_critique: The caption accurately describes the camera's upward motion and the scene it reveals. However, it violates the instruction to "Avoid emotional or subjective adjectives" by using the words "lush" and "majestic." The phrase "lush green trees" should be changed to "green trees," and "majestic mountain range" should be changed to "mountain range" to maintain a neutral tone.
revised_caption_by_generated_critique: This is a scenery shot where the camera slowly tilts upward. The video opens on a residential street with parked cars and a low-rise apartment building, all seen through a canopy of green trees. As the camera tilts up, it reveals a city skyline in the distance, featuring numerous high-rise buildings and a construction crane. In the far background, a mountain range with snow-dusted peaks stands against a blue sky with scattered white clouds.
